reviewText: These are very charming shorts. I wasn't even born when these movies were made but Boyer had that special big screen quality that draws you in, no matter your age. They are good, clean acting and romance. Sometimes there is a little darkness to the themes but very likable, entertaining performances. If you like Boyer, buy this and Volume 1.

Watched all 4 stories in one sitting and wished for more as soon as the last story ended.  I really like the Four Star Production sets and have put several more of them on my wish list.  If you're a fan of Mr. Boyer, you'll love this set too!!

See my review of Volume 1 and other Alpha Video items. Most all of these Alpha Video DVD's contain 4 episodes and cost less than
$8.00.
